unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about festival dates, huh? Well, planning around Indian festivals is like trying to nail jelly to a wall - it's a moving target! For example, folks start asking "When is Diwali?" approximately 365 days before Diwali. Then, depending on which panchang you follow, it's either 01/11/2024 or 02/11/2024. Good luck figuring that out! Don't even get me started on Ekadashi… 24 of those bad boys every year!
